review_data.title: Great cakes and coffee
review_data.content: The Juice Market is in the poshest part of Zürich, close to the big banks and watch shops. They serve great cakes and good coffee and of course juices. For a reasonable price against Swiss standards.

review_data.title: Good for a cup of "not that expensive" coffee in costly Zurich
